movies.title: Bad Boys
movies.description: Two hip detectives protect a murder witness while investigating a case of stolen Heroin.

movies.title: Bad Boys II
movies.description: Two loose-cannon narcotics cops investigate the flow of Ecstacy into Florida.

movies.title: We Were Soldiers
movies.description: The story of the first major battle of the American phase of the Vietnam War and the soldiers on both sides that fought it.

movies.title: Ratatouille
movies.description: A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous restaurant.

movies.title: Fast & Furious 6
movies.description: Hobbs has Dominic and Brian reassemble their crew to take down a team of mercenaries: Dominic unexpectedly gets convoluted also facing his presumed deceased girlfriend, Letty.

movies.title: Star Wars Episode I: The Phantom Menace
movies.description: Two Jedi Knights escape a hostile blockade to find allies and come across a young boy who may bring balance to the Force, but the long dormant Sith resurface to reclaim their old glory.

movies.title: Marvel's The Avengers
movies.description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

movies.title: Thor
movies.description: The powerful but arrogant god Thor is cast out of Asgard to live amongst humans in Midgard (Earth), where he soon becomes one of their finest defenders.
